page.title: 20THE COT HOUSE CARAVAN PARK
page.content: On one side of the Cot House Caravan Park there is a garage and on the other side there is a river and a main road (the A815).Its busiest time of the year is August when people come from all over the world to see the Cowal Games held in Dunoon which is about 3 miles away. At the Cot House Caravan Park there are 16 caravans.The facilities there include toilets,showers and there is also a bar and games room in the public house next door. There is a large piece of flat grass near the river Eachaig where some people camp in tents or in there own caravans.The river is also good for fishing,permits are easily available. In the Cot House area there is also a filling station and a cafe where you can buy supplies or have a good meal.
